title: Women representation in law firms
summary: The percentage of Women working in Law_Firms is significantly smaller than the percentage of Women working in Financial_Groups , Tech and Insurance .
At just 36 percentage , it is 30 percentage lower than the proportion of Women working in Insurance ( which has the highest proportion at 66 percentage .
gold: The graph shows the representation of woman in different sectors . This shows that women are less likely to be employed by law firms than financial groups , tech and insurance .
